title: Sputnik 1 Launch
description: The Soviet Union launched Sputnik 1, the world's first artificial satellite, marking the beginning of the Space Age and the Space Race.

title: Yuri Gagarin – First Human in Space
description: Soviet cosmonaut Yuri Gagarin orbited Earth aboard Vostok 1, becoming the first human to travel into space.

title: Alan Shepard – First American in Space
description: Astronaut Alan Shepard made a suborbital flight aboard Freedom 7, becoming the first American to travel into space.
